* Added WordPress HTML5 markup support
* Added WordPress HTML5 markup support for search form, comment form, comment list, and caption

MESSAGE.value: * Renamed `opus-ignite.php` to `opus-primus-ignite.php` and moved to theme root * Added `opus-primus-ignite.php` back into theme core to reduce clutter in `functions.php`
- updated example in documentation
- use `true` instead of `__return_true()` function for `apply_filters()` calls
- corrected "min-width: 321px" media query causing desktop display to be render wider than what it is
- change parameters of pagination method
- updated hooks-filters.txt and tested up to version

* Renamed `OpusPrimusNavigation::image_nav` to `OpusPrimusNavigation::image_link_navigation` - updated and improved inline documentation * Added `opus_image_link_navigation_output` filter hook to provide access to navigation output
* Replaced `OpusPrimusStructures::replace_spaces` with `sanitize_html_class`
- minor corrections to document
- update to version 1.2.5-beta (ready for release)
- re-organized current changelog into better alphabetized list
- more documentation updates and re-organization
* Added `opus_tagline` to default hidden screen options array
* Refactored `OpusPrimusTaglines::tagline_create_boxes` to clarify the parameter usage
- corrected inline documentation
* Updated `screenshot.png` to show a bit more of the theme display - updated to version 1.2.5 ... to be packaged and submitted to WordPress
- update `readme.txt` with https://themes.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/19955 reference - increased version to 1.3-alpha - noted new version number in `style.css`, `index.php`, and `changelog.txt`
- fix typo
* Added `post-title-link` wrapper class to better manage Post Title output
* Add new typography styles for better reading
- Add new typography styles for better reading
* Updated `editor-style.css` to match new typography of theme
- adjust post codas
* Added WordPress HTML5 markup support
* Added WordPress HTML5 markup support for search form, comment form, comment list, and caption

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: * Added WordPress HTML5 markup support for search form, comment form, comment list, and caption
